title: Mafia Jinx skin bug
body:
so I have recently noticed, and it's not a super huge deal as it's not game impacting, but the Mafia Jinx skin is bugged on her dance and recall. Basically in her dance her little phonograph doesn't show up and in her recall she is just shaking air
I was only able to capture this screen shot of her dance atm, will update with recall when I can

replies.body: Oh thank goodness! I thought it was a stealth removal because I loved spamming dance and watching the phonograph pop out of the ground repeatedly. I'm relieved that I will be able to do it again soon.
Haha, same!  I would always try to position it directly over allies.  I too would be sad if this was intentionally removed
As a Jinx main I did this literally before every match as a little ritual! that or after a really cool rocket kill :D
I saw that you guys got the fix out this patch, thank you for the quick response and fix of the bug :3

I was playing a game last night as Jinx and just said to my team "I wish they'd fix my dance  :(" then hit dance and up popped Grammy! I was sooooooooooo happy  :D  Thanks guys, it may be a small and very inconsequential thing but it really made me happy to see Grammy again.
i know i was so happy too, IM NOT SHAKING AIR NO MORE XD
Thanks for this post.  As an avid Jinx player myself I too have noticed this bug!  We do have a fix ready for it and should make it live shortly.
Thank you so much. It was starting to drive me crazy! What with her just shaking air on her recall. XD

o look at me dancing there
but why am i next to the bugy jinx girl
